0.text: Bug 15208  StyledText - text change even mechanism poorly documented.

1.text: build 20020430  The TextChangeListener doc is incomplete and misleading.

2.text: The class doc says that "It is not intended for use by users of the StyledText  widget or implementors of StyledTextContent".

3.text: This is misleading because  implementors of StyledTextContent need to invoke the apropriate listener  method.

4.text: So they need to use the TextChangeListener.

5.text: Should change to ...should  not be implemented by users of StyledText... etc.

6.text: The textChanged and textSet methods are not documented at all.

7.text: The doc for StyledTextContent.addTextChangeListener, replaceTextRange and  setText is incomplete.

8.text: The last two methods should mention which methods the  text events should be sent to.

9.text: This should be pretty obvious when looking at  the TextChangeListener but we may just want to mention it explicitly.
